thread.title: APRIL’s Very Own Variety Show Reveals Title And Format Details
thread.title_full: APRIL’s Very Own Variety Show Reveals Title And Format Details

author: JiwonYu
title: APRIL’s Very Own Variety Show Reveals Title And Format Details
text:
Pin   
It was previously announced that APRIL will be having their own show , and more details have now been revealed! 
The girl group’s new show will be called “A-IF-RIL,” and it will contain five episodes that will start airing on April 4 at 7 p.m. KST. The show aims to increase the group’s popularity by making the members promote themselves on their own. 
The members will be given certain missions to complete during each episode, and the show will realistically capture all the adventures members go through. 
What’s interesting is that viewers will be able to enjoy two versions of this reality show; one will be publicly broadcasted on TV, while the other one will be available online. Short clips of the show will be revealed every Monday night through Mnet’s digital channel M2, and those clips will be combined for a full one-hour broadcast that will air every Tuesday on Mnet. 
Moreover, APRIL’s official social media account will be updated real time while the members film the show and complete their missions. This way, the members will be able to communicate with fans even more closely as they show their true personalities. 
The teaser video for their new show “A-IF-RIL” will be released on March 15 at 7 p.m. through M2’s official Facebook page and YouTube channel. 
What do you think about the unique format of the show?
